Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Dearborn, Monroe and Michigan, due to street blockage near Jackson/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Dearborn, Monroe and Michigan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Jackson/Dearborn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
